alerts.description: Notify public group on Interaction Reason as FRA/TSA request
Shutdown Email Alerts OSS East Managers
Shutdown Email Alerts OSS South Managers
Shutdown Email Alerts OSS West Managers
Shutdown Email Alerts OSS North Managers

fieldUpdates.description: It populates Account Marketing Owner's email id in Case ,with the user's mail id (who is selected as Account Marketing Owner in the respective Account )
fieldUpdates.name: Populate Account Marketing Owner Email

fieldUpdates.description: Update the field to true so that it does not execute logic of Case trigger
fieldUpdates.name: WF Auto Release

fieldUpdates.description: Update After Hours checkbox when a case is created
fieldUpdates.name: Update After Hours

rules.description: For a Case, It auto populates the email id of associated Account's marketing owner.

It automatically nulls the Assigned To field on a Case record if the difference between the current Date/Time and the Last Modified Date/Time exceeds 7 hours, and the "Retain Case" checkbox is not selected.Logic excludes OSS Managers.
rules.formula: IF(AND (OR( NS_AssignedTo__r.UserRole.Name = 'OSS North Rep', NS_AssignedTo__r.UserRole.Name = 'OSS West Rep' ,NS_AssignedTo__r.UserRole.Name = 'OSS East Rep' ,NS_AssignedTo__r.UserRole.Name = 'OSS South Rep'),NS_RetainCaseOwnership__c = false,NS_AssignedTo__c!=null) ,true , false)

rules.description: Creates a Task record for Users assigned the OSS Support Role to process a request for Case deletion.
Increments the value by 1 when ever there is a case release.
cancel case notification email generated cases
Sets Assigned To field to NULL when the Case is Closed.
This workflow clears the "Unread Email" field on the Case object if the Case is Closed or Cancelled.
This workflow rule sets the Reopened checkbox to TRUE when the Status field is updated to Reopened.
Force cancel all cases with the subject line "TYES LOPI - Warning Bypassed".
This workflow updates the Status value of the Case record to Working if the previous Status value is Awaiting Response and a new email response is received
This rule updates checkbox, if the record is created during After Hours.
rules.formula: AND( AND(Owner:Queue.DeveloperName<>'NS_UTSEnergy', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName<>'NS_UTSGrain', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName<>'NS_UTSMetEx', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName<>'NS_UTSSupport', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName<>'NS_UTSTransportationPENDING', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName<>'NS_UTSUtilityCoal', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName<>'Demurrage', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName<>'NS_DataQuality', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName<>'NS_Clearances', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName<>'NS_RevenueProtectionRP', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName<>'NS_Special_Services', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName<>'Holiday_Polling', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName<>'NS_LoadingSecurementSolutions', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName<>'Freight_Claims', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName<>'NS_Southern_Region_East', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName<>'NS_Northern_Region_East', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName<>'NS_Southern_Region_West', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName<>'NS_Northern_Region_West', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName<>'NS_OSS_East_Operations', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName<>'NS_OSS_North_Operations', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName<>'NS_OSS_South_Operations', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName<>'NS_OSS_West_Operations', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName<>'NS_OSS_Support', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName<>'OSS_Leadership', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName<>'NS_OSS_Administrative', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName<>'NS_Southern_Region_East_Managers', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName<>'NS_Northern_Region_East_Managers', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName<>'NS_Southern_Region_West_Managers', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName<>'NS_Northern_Region_West_Managers', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName<>'Transfer_Queue'), OR( WEEKDAY(TODAY())=1, WEEKDAY(TODAY())=7, HOUR(TIMEVALUE(NOW()-((1/24)*4))) >= 18, HOUR(TIMEVALUE(NOW()-((1/24)*4))) < 8 ) )

rules.description: update Case record OSS VDN field value
update Top21 inquiry Cases recordtype to TOP21
